title: Free Win Promos
body: I recently made G5 before the end of the season. However, I did lose my promotions to G5 from S1 once. I was told, after getting back to promos for G5, that I would get a free win. I ended up getting 2 wins, and realized I didn't get my win to G5 like anticipated because I didn't get "my free win". So, I'm curious, does this not work for division promotions?

replies.body: Promo Helper works when you lose your promos but make it back into the series. Since you were going up a tier (Silver 1 to Gold 5) it takes 3 out of 5 wins. You started with 1 win and then won 2 games which promoted you!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WGt3cjba,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-19T21:44:35.986+0000)
>
> Promo Helper works when you lose your promos but make it back into the series. Since you were going up a tier (Silver 1 to Gold 5) it takes 3 out of 5 wins. You started with 1 win and then won 2 games which promoted you!

well no, what I'm saying is that I had to win 3 games. I didn't get my free win during promos ):
